page_content: The page offers educational programs for school classes in the Canton of Aargau, focusing on friendship, diversity, and self-appreciation through storytelling and creative activities.
The page discusses a workshop on the use of Geographic Information Systems (GIS) software in middle schools for spatial analysis.
The page provides documents and forms related to voting for Swiss citizens living abroad, including statistics and register forms.
The page provides legal notices, including copyright and data protection policies, for the Canton of Aargau's website.
The page discusses measures and regulations for dealing with dangerous dogs in the Canton of Aargau, including potential leash laws and mandatory training courses.
The page discusses the "1418coach" project, aimed at training young leaders for sports clubs in the Canton of Aargau.
The page discusses the efforts of rescue and disaster services in preventing severe flood damage in the Canton of Aargau.
